title: wine_Quinta_do_Pôpa_2014_Pôpa_Black_Edition_Red_(Douro)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 50245.
country: Portugal.
description: A richly spicy wine, showing its wood aging in the mint flavors as well as toast. Despite a dodgy harvest year, the wine has the dense, ripely fruity character that comes from winemakers João Menezes and Francisco Montenegro's use of foot treading and fermentation in open stone lagars and that gives great black fruits and soft tannins. This is a wine that is powerful and concentrated, ready to age for a few more years. Drink from 2020..
designation: Pôpa Black Edition.
points: 93.
price: 23.0.
province: Douro.

taster_name: Roger Voss.
